game

Class Zombie

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.Zombie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface

    public class Zombie
extends ZombieActor
    A Zombie. Zombies have a chance to say something Zombie-like each turn. Zombies can attack Humans with either a normal attack or a bite attack. If a Zombie is standing on a WeaponItem, it picks it up and uses it instead. On hit, a Zombie has a chance to lose any of its 4 limbs. Reduced limbs cause the Zombie to behave differently such as dropping its weapon when it loses its arms and losing the ability to move after losing both its legs. Dropped Zombie limbs can be wielded as weapons by the player.
    Author:
    Daniel Yuen

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()

        Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or different damage.

      • playTurn

        public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        Before beginning a turn, Zombies have a chance for to say something Zombie-like. If a Zombie can attack, it will. If the Zombie has only 1 leg, it only performs move actions once every two turns. If the Zombie has no legs, it will not be able to move at all. If it has both legs, it will perform its move actions, which is to chase any human within 10 spaces. If no humans are close enough it will wander randomly.
        Specified by:
        playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
        Parameters:
        actions - list of possible Actions
        lastAction - previous Action, if it was a multiturn action
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        display - the Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed
        Returns:
        the Action chosen to be performed

      • loseLimb

        public java.lang.String loseLimb(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        Has a chance to randomly remove a limb from the Zombie. Drops the weapon it was holding if it loses its arms. Drops the knocked off limb on the ground randomly on any of the 8 spaces around the Zombie.
        Parameters:
        map - the map where the current Zombie is
        Returns:
        String informing the result of knocking off the limb
